meta.name: description
meta.content: Convert any image to SVG file online with this free simple app

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: online-image-to-svg, convert-image-to -svg, free-online-svg-converter, svg-converter, image-to-SVG SVG converter,convert image to SVG,wittystore-online-image-svg-converter,convert-in-vector-graphics, wittystore-image-to-svg-conversion-tool, raster-to-vector, online SVG creator, wittystore-SVG-conversion-service, image-format-conversion
meta.title: Image to SVG Converter

div.p: Our user-friendly interface makes it easy for anyone to convert images to SVG. Upload your JPEG, PNG, GIF, or other common image formats, and our tool will handle the conversion process reliably.
Convert images to SVG in three simple steps:

ol.li: Our converter will quickly analyze and convert it to SVG.

div.p: Our Image to SVG Converter preserves key details, colors, and shapes. Ideal for graphic design projects, web development, and more.
Unlock the potential of SVG files - edit, resize, and customize without losing quality. Perfect for responsive web design.
Your privacy and security are important to us. We don't store uploaded images on our servers.
